title: Mexi Mexican Lady Lyrics Maharaja (Mahaaraaja) Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Singer: Hariharan
Song: Mexi Mexican Lady        
Movie: Maharaja
Lyrics: Na. Muthukumar 

Mexi Mexican Lady, 
en nenjukula nee vaadi
Unnaalthaan en idhayam thudikumadi
Mexi Mexican Lady, 
en nenjukula nee vaadi
Unnaalthaan en ulagam sulalumadi...

Unazhaginil imaigal kushikka,Un aruginil nimidam inika
Thaniyaai thavipathu kadhalil kudumaiyaadi
En aasaigal unnidaa uraikka, varum vaarthaigal valiyil vazhukka
Mounam thaane kadhalil maranamadi..

Mexi Mexican Lady, en nenjukula nee vaadi
Unnaalthaan en idhayam thudikumadi ...  oh baby
Mexi Mexican Lady, en nenjukula nee vaadi
Unnaalthaan en ulagam sulalumadi...

Un pechai ketkathaan nenjam yengum ennathaan seivadhu
Un paathai thaedi en kaalgal odum ennathaan seivadhu
Un moochu kaatru en aayul thedum ennathaan seivadhu
Nnee parthum paakkaamal ponnale nan ennathaan seivadhu

Kattipotu vaithaal kooda manasu ketkavillai
Vettivitu pogathaane kadhal nagamum illai
Poovai verodu killaadhe, Ennai Uyirodu kollaadhe
Odi olindhaalum nan undhan pinnale varuvene
Mexi Mexican Lady, en nenjukula nee vaadi ...

Unnai thozhaivil paarthale ennulle ennavo aanadhu
Un thozhil saaindhale ninaivin ulle ennavo aanadhu
En kadhal yekangal padhiyil penne ennavo aanadhu
Adhu unmai kaankindra kanavai pola ennavo aanadhu

Unnai partha pinnal thaane nanum mariponen
Undhan idhyam mattum enno maravillai penne
Maatram illadha aal endru mannil yaarum thaan kidayaadhu
Undha manam marum naalaithaan enni kaathirupen

Mexi Mexican Lady, en nenjukula nee vaadi
Unnaalthaan en idhayam thudikumadi ...  oh baby

Unazhaginil imaigal kushikka,Un aruginil nimidam inika
Thaniyaai thavipathu kadhalil kudumaiyaadi
En aasaigal unnidaa uraikka, varum vaarthaigal valiyil vazhukka
Mounam thaane kadhalil maranamadi..
